page.title: 06FIREX 85
page.content: On the 15th and 16th of June{FIREX was held at{Cranfield Airfield}for the third year. Thousands of people came and spent money that went to the Fireman's Benevolent Fund. It was sponsored by Bedford Fire Brigade.Over the years there have been: 1) Opportunities to drive, or ride in a fire engine. 2) Aeroplane rides. 3) Parascending. 4) Demonstrations of how the many fire engines work. 5) Fairground rides, and stalls. 6) Craft stalls and other trade stands. 7) Navy Displays. 8) Vintage car display. 9) Aerobatic displays. 10) Demonstrations of how they rescue people in car accidents.
